resources.string: In order to capture photo through camera and show location, this app needs your permission for that. Please click on \"Okay\" to grant it.
In order to show location, this app needs to enable your gps/location for that. Please click on \"Okay\" to enable it.
In order to track your location, this app needs your permission for that. Please click on \"Okay\" to grant it.
In order to capture photo through camera, this app needs your permission for that. Please click on \"Okay\" to grant it..
